channel.title: Github on JDi4Earth
channel.description: Recent content in Github on JDi4Earth

item.title: Simulation Codes
item.description: The project’s Earth system flagship application frameworks will demonstrate the various uses of derivative information for SBS and SciML in the context of (1) an open-source, AD-enabled ocean general circulation model, and (2) an open-source, AD-enabled ice flow model. Ocean modeling Oceananigans.jl is a fast and friendly fluid flow solver written in Julia that can be run in 1-3 dimensions on CPUs and GPUs. It can simulate the incompressible Boussinesq equations, the shallow water equations, or the hydrostatic Boussinesq equations with a free surface.
